description: This file defines the SameProcessServiceHandle class, which extends ServiceHandle to represent services running within the same virtual machine, bypassing IPC and event marshaling. It includes constructors, getters, setters, and overrides for process and host identification methods.

classes.name: SameProcessServiceHandle
classes.description: A ServiceHandle implementation for services operating within the same process, indicating no need for IPC or event marshaling, with methods to manage event producers and IPC handlers.

methods.name: SameProcessServiceHandle
methods.description: Constructor initializing the service handle with name, ipc, event, and optional visibility.

methods.name: getIpcHandler
methods.description: Returns the IPCReceiverHandler associated with this service handle.

methods.name: setIpcHandler
methods.description: Sets the IPCReceiverHandler for this service handle.

methods.name: getEventProducer
methods.description: Returns the JavaEventProducer associated with this service handle.

methods.name: setEventProducer
methods.description: Sets the JavaEventProducer for this service handle.

methods.name: isSameProcess
methods.description: Overrides to indicate this service is in the same process; always returns true.

methods.name: isLocalHost
methods.description: Overrides to indicate this service is on the local host; always returns true.

methods.name: isRemoteHost
methods.description: Overrides to indicate this service is not remote; always returns false.
